=== Configuration ===
{{{
kernel driver file:
 sprd_2713s_thm.c and sprd_thm.c in kernel/drivers/thermal/

macro:
 CONFIG_THERMAL_SC2713S

sensor config:
 kernel/arch/arm/boot/dts/sprd-scx35l_coreprimelite.dts
    sprd_thermal {
        compatible = "sprd,sprd-thermal";
        id = <0>;
        interrupts = <0 26 0x0>;
        reg = <0xf5260000 0x1000>;
        trip_points_active = <56 60 90 110>;
        trip_points_lowoff = <0 46 50 80>;
        trip_points_critical = <110>;
        trip_num = <5>;
    };

    sprd_thermal1 {
        compatible = "sprd,sprd-thermal";
        id = <1>; 
        interrupt-parent = <&adi>;
        interrupts = <9 0x0>;
        reg = <0xf51c8280 0x1000>;
        trip_points_active = <100>;
        trip_points_lowoff = <90>; /*no use, jut for compatiable*/
        trip_points_critical = <114>;
        trip_num = <2>; 
    };

    sprd_thermal2 {
        compatible = "sprd,sprd-thermal";
        id = <2>; 
        interrupts = <0 26 0x0>;
        reg = <0xf5260000 0x1000>;
        trip_points_active = <100>;
        trip_points_lowoff = <90>;
        trip_points_critical = <110>;
        trip_num = <2>; 
    };   
thermal:  arm
thermal1: a-die
thermal2: GPU
now, thermal is used.
